comments_since_last_sample.body: When the government classifies parents as domestic terrorists they have declared a WAR on parents authority and will push to subjugate them. The line has been drawn in the sand and the Democrats have put themselves on the other side of common sense and parental sovereignty. Time for the Democratic Party to either change or be rendered moot by our ability to vote them out of ALL offices of government. Perhaps when they actually care about their constituents then they can engender our vote again.
Very encouraging to hear these well-spoken moms!
